Stixbox Function

NOM

    rjbinom - Random numbers from the binomial distribution (reject method)

SEQUENCE D'APPEL

x = rjbinom(num,n,p)

PARAMETRES

    • num : positive integer or vector [lig,col] of integers
    • n : nonnegative integer
    • p : probability (scalar)
    • x : vector or matrix of random numbers chosen from binomial distribution B(n,p)

DESCRIPTION

    Random numbers from the binomial distribution (reject method)

    Adapted from Press, Teukolsky, Vetterling and Flannery, Numerical Recipes in C p.220
